For every one million turkeys we cook, around 250 tonnes of fats could be poured down the sink. 

Leftover cooking fats can harden in cold pipes and create blockages, increasing the risk of sewer flooding.  

Instead leave to cool, then scrape into the bin. https://t.co/x4S4yCfeUE

@RussellB1ggs @Feargal_Sharkey @MerryAlbright @The_WMA @DefraWater @N_Rivers_Trust @EnvAgencyAnglia @angliawater @JamesBevanEA @theriverstrust @WNGreens @jamesowild @TrudyClark1 @carlsayerUCL @WestNorfolkBC The ammonia is lethal. @RussellB1ggs @Feargal_Sharkey @MerryAlbright @The_WMA @DefraWater @N_Rivers_Trust @EnvAgencyAnglia @angliawater @JamesBevanEA @theriverstrust I mean, it's too strong even for plant food, let alone releasing into a river üò†

Filmed at 3.45pm today still pouring with rain & just hate to think how much more üí©is gushing into this Chalkstream didn‚Äôt bother reporting it as the EA will probably now be on holiday ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èwith proper enforcement this could have been stopped in July @EnvAgencyAnglia

@MerryAlbright @The_WMA @DefraWater @Feargal_Sharkey @N_Rivers_Trust @EnvAgencyAnglia @angliawater @JamesBevanEA @theriverstrust Collected a sample of the runoff in September & tested by @N_Rivers_Trust Ammonia 480mg per litre Phosphate 80mg per litre & solids off the scale  EA contacted me as they couldn‚Äôt understand why the Phosphate was so high Septic waste contains Washing/dishwasher powder https://t.co/Tgbe3d8kRv

tweets.text: We've removed two flood warnings on the Aire and Calder Navigation between #Pollington and #Goole. Water levels have stabilised following a multi-agency operation led by @CanalRiverTrust to repair a breach in the embankment. https://t.co/OVBXgMyngb https://t.co/3ANxhkQIOc

Heavy rain forecast across some parts of the the south west this evening, falling on already saturated land. We continue to closely monitor the situation, responding as necessary. Our teams are already out clearing trash screens. One flood warning issued for the Washford River.
